foods.name: MOMO
foods.description: momos are dumplings made with flour and a savory stuffing. This stuffing can be made with veggies, sea-food, chicken or paneer (cottage cheese) .

foods.name: Octopus
foods.description: Octopus boiled with nepalese spices and coated with tandoori masala and baked.

foods.name: Raita
foods.description: it is the spised curd with some vehetables.

foods.name: Vakka
foods.description: it is steames rice floor, served with vegetable and chatni.

foods.name: sekauwa
foods.description: grilled chicken, goat meat , pork, buff along with some puffed rice.

foods.name: choila
foods.description: it is leamony grilled meat with some spices

foods.name: chatpate
foods.description: nepalese spicy street food which is very spicy full of clilly and leamon

foods.name: okra
foods.description: it is vegetable with some cheese

foods.name: pakauda
foods.description: deep fried vegetable in pea flour, served with spicy chatni
